mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (member_id, login_id, password, nickname, gender, birthdate) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{birthdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT count(login_id) FROM MEMBER WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT count(nickname) FROM MEMBER WHERE nickname = #{nickname} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT member_id, login_id, password, nickname, point, gender, birthDate, created_at, deleted_at FROM MEMBER WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN '사용' WHEN type = 2 THEN '적립' END AS type, amount, description, TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS created_at, total.total_count FROM POINT_HISTORY CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM POINT_HISTORY WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ) total WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT P.post_id, C.image_url, P.recommend_count, P.reply_count, P.rank, P.created_at, total.total_count FROM POST P LEFT JOIN COORDINATION C ON P.coordination_id = C.coordination_id CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM POST WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND member_id = #{memberId} ) total WHERE P.deleted_at IS NULL AND P.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY
P.created_at DESC
P.recommend_count DESC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT coordination_id, title, image_url FROM COORDINATION WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY coordination_id DESC

SELECT CI.category_id, IO.item_id, I.image_url, I.detail_image_url FROM COORDINATION_ITEM CI LEFT JOIN ITEM_OPTION IO ON CI.item_option_id = IO.item_option_id LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON IO.item_id = I.item_id WHERE CI.coordination_id = #{coordinationId}
SELECT O.order_id, P.approved_at, O.order_name, P.total_amount FROM ORDERS O LEFT JOIN PAYMENT P ON O.order_id = P.order_id WHERE O.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT O.order_id, TO_CHAR(P.approved_at, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS approved_at, O.orderer_name, O.orderer_phone, O.location, I.image_url AS item_image_url, I.name AS item_name, S.image_url AS shop_image_url, S.name AS shop_name, IO.item_option, OI.item_count, OI.price AS item_price, O.price_before_discount, O.point_usage, P.total_amount, P.method, P.method_detail, P.installments_month FROM ORDERS O LEFT JOIN PAYMENT P ON O.order_id = P.order_id LEFT JOIN ORDER_ITEM OI ON O.order_id = OI.order_id LEFT JOIN ITEM_OPTION IO ON OI.item_option_id = IO.item_option_id LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON IO.item_id = I.item_id LEFT JOIN SHOP S ON I.shop_id = S.shop_id WHERE O.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POINT_HISTORY ( point_history_id, member_id, type, amount, description, created_at ) VALUES ( SEQ_POINT_HISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{type}, #{amount}, #{description}, SYSDATE )
